title: pAlayamAm brhadIshvari bhaktajanAvana shankari
sahitya:
pAlayamAm brhadIshvari bhaktajanAvana shankari


anupallavi

 bAla candrashEkhari bAlA paramEshvari vallIsha guruguhAdi vandita varadA bhayakari


caraNam   brhadIshvara mOhini brhannAyaki dhanini paramahamsa svarUpiNi paramashAnta prakAshini 
mahEndrAd-yupAsitE lalitE mangaLa varadE sahasra daLa padmasthitE sadAnanda sahitE
